title: Health Monitoring Integration
summary: As a tech-curious older adult with mild mobility issues, I want ALFRED to integrate with my wearable health-monitoring device so that I can track my vital signs and receive real-time health data to manage my health efficiently.

title: Emergency Alert Activation
summary: As a tech-curious older adult with mild mobility issues, I want to activate an emergency alert using a simple voice command so that I can quickly notify my caregivers or emergency services in case of a health crisis or fall.

title: Medication Management Support
summary: As a tech-curious older adult, I want to track my medications and receive reminders so that I can manage my health efficiently and maintain my independence.

title: Caregiver Communication Portal
summary: As an older adult, I want my caregivers to have access to my health data and medication schedules so that they can provide better support and coordination of my care.

title: Personalized Health Recommendations
summary: As an older adult, I want ALFRED to analyze my health data and provide personalized health and wellness recommendations so that I can manage my health efficiently and maintain my independence.

title: Health Progress Tracking
summary: As an older adult, I want to track my health progress over time so that I can visualize changes in my health metrics and receive motivational feedback.
